sbox-ai-agent-regression_faq_20251210114.title: How to clear Browser Cache and Cookies
sbox-ai-agent-regression_faq_20251210114.body: Google Chrome On your computer, open Chrome. In the top right, click More. In More Tools, Click Clear browsing data. At the top, choose a time range. To delete everything, select All Time. Check the boxes located next to ‘ Cookies and other site data ’ and ‘ Cached images and files’ . Click Clear Data. Firefox From the History menu, select Clear Recent History . If the menu bar is hidden, press Alt to make it visible. From Time Range to Clear: drop-down menu, select the desired range; To clear your entire cache, select Everything. Next to ' Details ', click the down arrow to choose which elements of the history to clear; to clear your entire cache, select All Items. Click Clear Now. Exit/quit all browser windows and re-open the browser. Microsoft Edge In the top right, click the Hub icon (which looks like a star with three horizontal lines). Click the History icon (which looks like a clock), and then select Clear All History. Select Browsing history, then Cookies and saved website data, and then Cached data and files. Click Clear. After an ' All Clear! ' message appears, exit/quit all browser windows and re-open the browser.

If you run an Android Phone ( anything not Apple): G o into your recent apps list by tapping the square button on screen ( can also be two 90 degree-angles icon on Samsung Phones) Find the game among your open apps Tap and hold the app and swipe it to the right. After that, simply start the game again, and all should be loaded up with fresh data.

This guide shows you exactly how to safeguard your game account so you can play anywhere, anytime, on any device - and never worry about starting over again. What's Account Linking All About? Think of account linking as your game's personal bodyguard! By connecting your game to services you already use (like Facebook, Google, or Apple), you create an unbreakable bond between you and your progress. No matter what happens to your device, your achievements, levels, and rewards stay safe and sound. Amazing benefits you'll get: 🔄 Play seamlessly across all your devices 🛡️ Your progress is protected even if your phone breaks or gets lost 🌟 Switch between iPhone, Android, and web - your game follows you everywhere 🎁 Earn fantastic bonus rewards for each account you link! 🔗 Choose Your Perfect Protection Plan Different platforms offer different ways to keep your account safe. Here's what's available on your device: Service Android (Google Play) Android (Amazon) iOS Web Browser Facebook ✅ Yes ✅ Yes ✅ Yes ✅ Yes Google ✅ Yes ✅ Yes ✅ Yes ✅ Yes Apple ID ❌ No ❌ No ✅ Yes ✅ Yes Email (Passwordless) ❌ No ❌ No ✅ Yes ✅ Yes Important: Google and Email authentication use the same Firebase system, so you can only link to one of these options, not both. 🚀 Super Easy Setup - Just 3 Quick Steps! 🎯 Step 1: Find Your Link Options Ready to protect your progress? You can Sign in from any of these convenient spots in the game: 📷 Tap your profile picture and look for signing options ⚙️ Visit your Profile settings 👥 Check the Social or Friends section 📰 Keep an eye out for helpful prompts in your game feed 🎆 Step 2: Pick Your Favorite Service Choose the service that works best for you! Remember, each one you connect gives you awesome bonus rewards - so why not sign in to multiple accounts for maximum protection and prizes? ✨ Step 3: Quick & Easy Connection Just follow the simple prompts for your chosen service: 🔵 Facebook: Sign in with your Facebook account - it's that simple! 🔴 Google: Use your Google account to connect instantly. 🍎 Apple ID: Use Face ID, Touch ID, or your Apple password for super-secure linking. 📧 Email: Enter your email and click the magic link we send you! 🎆 Getting Your Game Back on a New Device 🎉 Already Linked? You're All Set! If you've already linked your account, getting back to your game is a breeze: 📱 Download and install the game on your shiny new device 🔍 When the game starts, look for the "Sign In" options ✨ Choose the same service you used before (Facebook, Google, Apple, or Email) 🔑 Sign in with your account 🎆 Watch the magic happen - all your progress appears instantly! 😢 Haven't Signed in Yet? Don't Panic! If you haven't linked your game account yet, your current progress is tied to your specific device. While we can't transfer unlinked progress, there's great news - you can start linking right now to protect all future progress! 💡 Pro Tip: The best time to link your account is TODAY! Don't wait until you need it - protect your progress now and play with confidence! 🔧 Quick Fixes for Common Questions 🔄 "Account Already Linked" - No Problem! Seeing this message? It just means this service is already protecting another account. You have two great options: 🎆 Keep your existing account: Continue with the account that's already safely linked 🎆 Switch to your current account: This will move the protection to your current game progress 📧 Email Link Playing Hide and Seek? If your email verification isn't showing up, try these quick fixes: 🔍 Check your spam or junk folder - sometimes it hides there! 📱 Make sure you're opening the link on the same device where you requested it ⏰ Use the link quickly - it won't wait around forever! 🔄 No luck? Just request a fresh link and try again 🤖 Google Link Being Shy on Android? Google linking works best with the official version of our game from the Play Store. If you're using a test version, this feature might be taking a little break! 🚀 Our Support Team is Here to Help! Still having trouble? Don't worry - our friendly support team loves helping players get back to their games! 💬 Use the in-game help system for the fastest response 📝 Tell us all about what's happening - the more details, the better we can help! 🎮 Include your player ID if you have it handy 🔗 Let us know which linking methods you've tried 💡 Remember: The absolute BEST time to link your account is right now! Don't wait for tomorrow - protect your progress today and play with total peace of mind!

sbox-ai-agent-hsqt-qa-v1_faq_20260107104.title: What is GDPR?
sbox-ai-agent-hsqt-qa-v1_faq_20260107104.body: DATA PRIVACY PROTECTION IS OUR HUUUGE RESPONSIBILITY [If you want to submit a request pursuant to GDPR, click Contact Us] What is GDPR? The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a data protection and privacy regulation within the European Union and the European Economic Area (EEA). The goal of GDPR is to give individuals in the European Union control over their personal data and to unify data privacy and protections laws within the European Countries. What is Personal Data under GDPR? In the context of GDPR, ‘Personal Data’ refers to any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person (‘data subject’). What Personal Data do we collect? The personal data Huuuge collects can be divided into three categories: 1. Data you provide to us ● Contact information (such as full name and email address) ● Profile information (such as age or gender or photograph) ● Your messages to the Service (such as chat logs and player support tickets) ● Other data you choose to give us 2. Data we collect automatically Data about your account and in-game progress Your IP address and mobile device identifiers (such as your device ID, advertising ID) Data about your device, such as device manufacturer, model, operating system and language General location data like country or city name Data about your use of the Service, such as gameplay data and your interactions with other players inside the games 3. Data we receive from our partners ● Data we receive if you link your Facebook account with our game ● Data to fight fraud (such as refund abuse in games or click fraud in advertising) ● Data from platforms that the games run on ● Data for advertising and analytics purposes, so we can provide you a better Service Why do we collect this data? This is probably the first question on your mind. First of all, we require this data to make our games work (from creating accounts to enabling you to connect to our games, including verifying your payments). Further, in an effort to continually make our games better, we are also using your data to develop and improve player experience, respond to your questions and provide support, manage our relationship with you, and enable you to communicate with other players. We may also use personal data to show you personalized advertisements tailored to your preferences. Last, but certainly not least, personal data is used to keep our services safe and fair by analyzing and monitoring the use of our games and social features. It enables us to take action against specific players involved in inappropriate behavior from in-game toxicity to cheating and fraud. In all of the above cases we may analyze, profile and segment all collected data as needed. What is Huuuge doing to protect your Personal Data? ● Using all appropriate technical, organizational and logistic measures to keep your data secure ● Notifying authorities of personal data breaches, if necessary ● Obtaining appropriate consent for data processing, if required ● Keeping records detailing data processing ● Providing privacy training for all our personnel ● Auditing and updating our data policies ● Employing a Data Protection Officer What are your rights under GDPR? Your rights as a data subject under GDPR include the following: Reviewing your personal data Upon your request, we will provide you with a copy of all your personal data stored in our systems in an easy-to access electronic format. Erasing your personal data You may request, under certain conditions, to have your personal data erased at any time. Please be advised that by erasing your personal data, all game progress will be also be deleted and you will no longer be able to log in and play. This process cannot be undone, deleted accounts cannot be recovered. Please do not remove our game before submitting a deletion request, as we may not be able to verify your identity in that case. Anonymized copies of some data (e.g. game logs) may remain in our database for some time. Please consult our Privacy Policy for more details (see below). Opting-in or opting-out of email communication You may opt-in or opt-out of receiving additional communications, such as marketing emails or newsletters, from us by using the options provided in the game under Settings -> Edit -> Profile -> Edit. Other types of requests Correcting your personal data Transferring your personal data Objecting to certain processing activities Restricting data processing under certain circumstances Opting-in or opting-out of personalized advertising You can submit any of these request to our Support team through the in-game Help option, found in Settings (FAQ). Our Support team is also happy to answer any further questions you may have. You can find our detailed Privacy Policy in our in-game FAQ or at http://www.huuugegames.com/privacy-policy

sbox-ai-agent-hsqt-qa-v1_faq_20260107104.title: Why are my slot games stuck on loading after the update?
sbox-ai-agent-hsqt-qa-v1_faq_20260107104.body: Updates usually contain many changes and while the main file is downloaded quite fast, other files like graphics for slots are downloaded at the moment when a player wants to play a given game. If you try to start a few slots at a time, files are queued for download and if the first game loads, there are still files downloading in the background. And that uses the bandwidth and may cause issues during playing. Solution? After the update, wait patiently for the game of your choice to fully download. If the loading last more than 2-3 minutes, restart the app and try again.

sbox-ai-agent-regression_faq_20251210114.body: If you find that the cost of an in-app purchase is higher than you expected, please follow these steps to understand and potentially resolve the issue: 1. Check the Advertised Price: Remember that all in-app purchase prices we display are in USD. 2. Understand Currency Conversion: - Your App Store converts the USD price into your national currency. - Be aware that App Stores use their currency conversion rates, which may not match the official market rates. 3. Identify Additional Charges: - Recognize that your payment provider might add taxes and extra fees depending on your region's legal requirements. - Apple, Google Play, and Facebook may include additional fees and/or taxes for using their payment platforms. 4. Research Tax Policies: - For Apple's tax policy details, visit [Apple's Payments Help]( https://www.apple.com/shop/help/payments ). - For Google Play's tax policy, consult [Google Play Help]( https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/2850368?hl=en ). - For Facebook's approach to tax, refer to [Facebook Help]( https://www.facebook.com/help/248471068848455/?helpref=hc_fnav ). 5. For iOS Users (Apple App Store): - Apple's App Store may consolidate several purchases into a single bill. - If your bill has an issue, contact App Store support directly through [Apple Contact]( https://www.apple.com/contact/ ). 6. Seek Support When Necessary: - Contact your App Store's customer support if you have questions or need further clarification about specific charges. - They'll provide transaction details and help you understand any charge discrepancies. 7. Review Purchase History: - Regularly check your in-app purchase history. - Confirm that all listed charges correlate with your in-app activities. Following these instructions will inform you more about your in-app purchases and the potential reasons for higher charges. Always ensure that any in-app transactions align with your expectations and budget.

sbox-ai-agent-regression_faq_20251210114.body: ⚖️ Conquest Loyalty Rules Club loyalty during Conquest has important consequences that every member should understand! 💍 Power Ring Contribution If you leave your club during Conquest: ✅ Rings Stay: Your earned Power Rings still count for the club you left ❌ No Rewards: You won't be eligible for any challenge or tournament rewards 🚪 Ways Members Can Leave 🤝 Voluntary Departure: You decided to leave the club 📝 Transfer Request: You sent a request to join another club (even accidentally) ⏰ Inactivity Removal: Club Guard removed you for being inactive ⚖️ Leadership Decision: Club leaders expelled you from the club 💡 Strategy Tip: Stay loyal to your club throughout the entire Conquest to maximize your reward potential!

sbox-ai-agent-regression_faq_20251210114.title: 🔄 What Happens When a Season Ends?
sbox-ai-agent-regression_faq_20251210114.body: Don't worry - your hard work pays off forever! 💎 Keep Your Treasures: All collected charms and earned rewards stay with you permanently 🆕 Fresh Adventures: A brand new season launches with exciting themes and items 🔄 New Challenges: Collection progress resets, giving you fresh goals to pursue 👑 Exclusive Legacy: Some seasonal items become rare collectibles that show your history 🏆 Pro Collector Tips for Success 🚀 Early Bird Advantage: Start collecting as soon as new seasons launch for maximum time 🎯 Complete Sets First: Focus on finishing entire sets for the biggest reward bonuses 💎 Strategic Trading: Save your trade tokens for those hard-to-find legendary items 📅 Daily Habit: Check in every day for special offers and surprise bonuses 💰 Smart Spending: Plan your chip budget and choose packs that offer the best value 🤝 Community Power: Connect with other collectors for trading opportunities and tips 🛠️ Need Help? We've Got You Covered! 🔍 Can't Find the Charms Feature? 📈 Make sure you've progressed far enough in Huuuge Casino 🔄 Check for game updates in your app store 🔄 Try restarting the app to refresh everything ❓ Missing Items or Rewards? 👀 Double-check your collection - items might be there but in a different section 📶 Ensure you have a stable internet connection 🆘 Contact our amazing Player Support team if items are genuinely missing 🤝 Trading Troubles? 🪙 Verify you have enough trade tokens for your desired trades 🏆 Remember that golden items and some special items cannot be traded ✅ Check that both you and your trading partner meet all requirements 💬 Still Need Help? Our friendly Player Services team is always ready to help! Contact us through the in-game help system, and we'll get you back to collecting in no time! 🎮
